analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.10. Sappaṭighaduka🔽Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ
analyzed: sappaṭigha duka  na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sappaṭigha
translated: The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Pairs in Direct Opposition🔽The Pair: With impingement, without impingement🔽With impingement as condition, a with-impingement dhamma arises. With impingement as condition, a without-impingement dhamma arises. With impingement as condition, a with-impingement and a without-impingement dhammas arise.

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca🔽nasappaṭigho ca naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca  na sappaṭighaḥ ca na appaṭighaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: Without impingement as condition …🔽With impingement and without impingement as condition, a with-impingement dhamma arises. With impingement and without impingement as condition, a without-impingement dhamma arises. With impingement and without impingement as condition, a with-impingement and a without-impingement dhammas arise.

original: Nasappaṭighañca naappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sappaṭighañca na appaṭighañca dhammam paṭicca na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate nava
translated: Nine in the cause, one in the object … non-obstruction, nine.

analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa
translated: The section on the conascent condition … the section on the conjoined condition … the section on the condition qua decisive support is similar to the section on the condition qua object.

original: Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasappaṭigho
analyzed: na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ
translated: A with-impingement dhamma is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a with-impingement dhamma. A with-impingement dhamma …

original: dhammo naappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa🔽ca naappaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.🔽Nasappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naappaṭigho dhammo nasappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte nava,🔽aññamaññe cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye dve, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ,
analyzed: dhammaḥ na appaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa  ca na appaṭighassa ca dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ  na sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na sappaṭighassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta  hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā cattāri anantare ekam pe sahajāte nava  aññamaññe cha nissaye nava upanissaye dve purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane eka
translated: A state that is not a condition for a state that is not a condition …

original: kamme …pe… āhāre tīṇi, indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte🔽cattāri …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: kamme pe āhāre tīṇi indriye pañca jhāne magge tīṇi sampayutte eka vippayutte 🔽cattāri pe avigate nava
